duties_responsibilities.duty: Merchandise products for display and placement to attract sales at customer stores and secondary and perimeter locations.
Provide sales support to Sales Associate - Field and assist with merchandise resets at customer locations.
Break down orders in receiving area, move product onto customer shelves or displays, and maintain product quality and quantity by rotating products and checking code dates.
Verify accuracy of load deliveries, follow store-specific receiving procedures, and maintain fixture cleanliness to enhance sales.
Plan and carry out daily schedules according to assigned customer locations and manage timelines to ensure completion of assigned customer requirements.
Communicate product merchandising needs and customer requirements with sales and support teams.
Operate office- and field-based electronic equipment for communications with team members and operate a motor vehicle to travel to customer locations throughout the assigned territory.
Maintain a clean work environment and attend store inventories to verify accuracy of product counts, reporting results to the District Manager.
Fulfill other duties as assigned to meet company objectives.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, with access to reliable transportation and a valid driver’s license.
